title: Tenant Multi-step Profile Creation Success
description: Verify that a tenant can successfully complete the multi-step profile creation wizard with valid input on all 7 steps and submit the profile.

steps.description: Start tenant profile creation wizard.
Fill personal information step with valid data.
Proceed to employment details step and enter valid employment data.
Complete household details step with accurate data.
Fill housing preferences and guarantor information steps with valid entries.
Enter references and motivation details in final steps.
Submit the profile creation wizard.
Verify that profile is saved successfully and tenant is redirected to their dashboard.

title: Tenant Profile Creation Validation Errors
description: Ensure proper validation prevents progression when invalid or missing data is entered in required fields during profile creation.

steps.description: Open tenant profile creation wizard.
Leave required personal information fields empty and attempt to proceed.
Verify validation errors are displayed and navigation to next step is blocked.
Enter invalid data formats (e.g. invalid phone number, email) in subsequent steps.
Check form shows appropriate validation error messages.
Attempt to upload unsupported file types in document upload step.
Verify upload is rejected with clear error message.

title: User Registration and Email Verification Flow
description: Verify tenant and landlord registration includes email verification and password strength enforcement.

steps.description: Navigate to user registration page.
Enter valid registration details with strong password.
Submit registration form.
Check registration is successful and verification email is sent.
Attempt login before verification and verify access is denied.
Click email verification link and verify email status updates.
Login with verified account successfully.
Attempt registration with weak password and verify rejection with error message.

title: User Login and Password Reset
description: Test that users can login with correct credentials and perform password reset with email confirmation flow.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid credentials and login.
Verify user is redirected to the role-specific dashboard.
Logout and navigate to password reset page.
Request password reset with registered email.
Confirm password reset email is sent.
Complete password reset using the link with a new strong password.
Verify password is updated and user can login with new password.

title: Role-Based Dashboard Access Control
description: Ensure that tenants, landlords, reviewers, and admin users can only access their respective dashboards and features.

steps.description: Login as tenant and attempt to access landlord, reviewer, and admin dashboards.
Verify access is denied with proper authorization error or redirect.
Login as landlord and try to access tenant, reviewer, and admin dashboards.
Access is prevented with error or redirect.
Repeat for reviewer and admin roles attempting unauthorized dashboards.
Ensure only authorized dashboards and features are accessible.

title: Property Search and View Verified Tenants
description: Validate landlords can perform filtered searches for verified tenants and view detailed tenant profiles.

steps.description: Login as landlord and navigate to tenant search interface.
Apply various filters (e.g., employment status, household size) and perform search.
Verify search results contain only verified tenant profiles matching filters.
Select a tenant profile for detailed view.
Verify all profile details are correctly displayed with verified status.

title: Document Upload Validation and GDPR-Compliant Deletion
description: Test document uploads enforce file type and size restrictions, are stored securely, reviewed, and deleted according to GDPR after rejection or upon user request.

steps.description: Tenant uploads verification documents with accepted file types and sizes.
Documents upload successfully and stored in secure Cloudflare R2 storage with signed URLs.
Attempt to upload disallowed file types or files exceeding size limits.
Uploads are rejected with clear error messages.
Reviewer approves or rejects uploaded documents.
Upon rejection, document is deleted from storage and user is notified via in-app and email notification.
Tenant requests document deletion as a data subject right.
Documents are removed securely and audit logs are updated for GDPR compliance.

title: Stripe Payment and Subscription Management
description: Verify successful subscription payment processing via Stripe and management of subscription status including cancellation and renewal.

steps.description: Tenant initiates subscription via payment modal.
Complete payment using valid Stripe test card.
Verify subscription is active, status is updated correctly in tenant dashboard.
Tenant views subscription status and attempts to cancel subscription.
Cancellation is processed, subscription status updates, and relevant notifications are sent.
Attempt payment with invalid card data.
Payment is declined with appropriate error message.

title: Messaging Between Users with Notifications
description: Test the internal messaging system enables secure communication and triggers in-app and email notifications when messages are sent.

steps.description: Tenant sends message to landlord via messaging interface.
Message is delivered and visible in both users' message inboxes.
Landlord receives in-app notification and email alert about new message.
Landlord replies to tenant's message.
Tenant receives reply with corresponding notifications.

title: Admin User Management and Role Assignment
description: Verify admin can create, edit, assign roles, and delete users with restrictions based on role permissions.

steps.description: Admin logs into admin dashboard and opens user management interface.
Create a new user with tenant role.
User is created and visible in user list with correct role.
Edit user role from tenant to landlord.
Role change is saved and reflected correctly.
Delete user account.
User is removed and cannot log in.

title: Performance Testing of APIs and Page Load Times
description: Ensure all critical API endpoints respond under 500ms for 95% of requests and all pages load within 3 seconds in production environment.

steps.description: Execute load test on primary API endpoints such as authentication, profile creation, property search.
Measure response times ensuring 95% are below 500ms.
Load key pages including dashboards, search results, and profile views.
Verify page load times are under 3 seconds.

title: Localization Verification for Dutch Language
description: Confirm that all application interfaces, messages, and notifications are fully localized in Dutch language.

steps.description: Navigate through all user-facing pages including registration, profile wizard, dashboards, and notifications.
Verify all text is presented in correct Dutch translations without English fallback.
Trigger system messages and error alerts.
Confirm all messages are properly localized.

title: Automated GDPR Compliance Checks
description: Verify that automated document deletion, audit logging, and data subject right requests are handled as per GDPR requirements.

steps.description: Submit document for review and then reject it.
Confirm document is deleted automatically and deletion is logged.
Submit a data subject right request for data deletion.
Check personal data is removed securely and audit records updated.
Attempt to access deleted documents or data.
Verify data is no longer accessible.

title: Secure File Storage and Signed URL Access
description: Test that uploaded files are securely stored in Cloudflare R2 and AWS S3 with access only via signed URLs to ensure data protection.

steps.description: Upload a verification document file.
Confirm the file is stored in Cloudflare R2 storage.
Access the file URL without a signed URL token.
Verify access is denied.
Access the file using a valid signed URL.
Confirm file downloads successfully.
